# Logarithms

> Reference: @stewart2016a

## General rules

* $y = \log_{a} x \quad \text{means} \quad a^{y} = x$
* $\log_{a} a^{x} = x$
* $\log_{a} 1 = 0$
* $\log x = \log_{10} x$
* $\log_{a} xy = \log_{a} x + \log_{a} y$
* $\log_{a} x^{b} = b \log_{a} x$
* $a^{\log_{a} x} = x$
* $\log_{a} a  = 1$
* $\ln x = \log_{e} x$
* $\log_{a} \left ( \cfrac{x}{y} \right ) = \log_{a} x - \log_{a} y$
* $\log_{b} x = \cfrac{\log_{a} x}{\log_{a} b}$
